text: here's how to wear a face covering first
off wash your hands before putting it on
using soap or an alcohol-based sanitizer
gel without touching the front cover
your mouth and nose it should go all the
way up to the bridge of your nose and
down under your chin hook the straps
around your ears or tie them around the
back of your head you don't want any
gaps between your face and the mask
avoid touching your nose eyes or mouth
at all times take it off from behind
store it in a plastic bag until you can
wash it and then wash your hands and
wash it regularly with your other
laundry using your normal detergent but
remember a face covering isn't a
substitute for hand-washing or social
distancing and the World Health
Organization says you should only wear a
medical mask if you're sick or you're
caring for someone who's sick
